document_data.caption: Map of the Cliffride circa [[1357]] DR.
document_data.name: Cliffride
document_data.mainbody: The '''Cliffride''' was a street in the [[Castle Ward of Waterdeep]] that crawled up the north spur of [[Mount Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: The Cliffride was located on the seaward side of the northern spur of Mount Waterdeep. It began at [[Julthoon Street]] and climbed in a southeasterly direction until it reached [[New Olamn]] bardic college (established in the [[1366 DR|Year of the Staff, 1366 DR]]). It was paved with gravel and very steep. It became even more treacherous in winter when covered in snow or when ice tended to form on everything the sea spray touched.
document_data.Notable Locations:
Map labels refer to the map above, ''circa'' the [[1368 DR|Year of the Banner, 1368 DR]].
; [[Fair Winds]] (C2)
: A villa that was available for rent.
; [[Silavene's]] festhall (C3)
: Formerly a rental villa called [[Marblehearth]],{{Cite dragon/268/The New Adventures of Volo: Lost Princess Road|91}}
; New Olamn bardic college (C72)
: This walled compound encompassed two former rental villas, [[Stormwatch]] and [[Heroes' Rest]], (See gallery.)
; The [[Sahuagin Humbled]]
: In the [[1370 DR|Year of the Tankard, 1370 DR]], [[Khelben Arunsun|Khelben "Blackstaff" Arunsun]] parked one of the [[Walking Statues of Waterdeep]] on the bluff overlooking Julthoon Street and the [[Field of Triumph]]. It was still in this location as of the [[1492 DR|Year of Three Ships Sailing, 1492 DR]].
